trans-unit.source: Provides the data portion of an <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref>.
This is a sealed class, so you can not inherit from it.
trans-unit.target: 這是密封的類別，因此您不可以繼承自它。

trans-unit.source: Also, the constructor is private, so you cannot create a new instance of it.
trans-unit.target: 此外，建構函式是私人的因此您無法建立它的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An ImageListStreamer is returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageStream%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>.

However, you cannot use this class to load images to an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> control by directly assigning the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageStream%2A> property from one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>.
trans-unit.target: 不過，您無法使用這個類別來載入映像，以<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>直接將<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageStream%2A>屬性從一個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageStream%2A>指派來控制</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>

trans-unit.source: Instead you should directly assign one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> instance to another (for example, `ImageList2 = ImageList1)`.
trans-unit.target: 而是您應該直接指派一個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>到另一個執行個體 (例如， `ImageList2 = ImageList1)`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 目前的執行個體所使用的資源全部釋出<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer>.
The `Dispose` method leaves the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose`方法會使<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer>中無法使用的狀態。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer>

trans-unit.source: After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫`Dispose`，您必須釋放所有參考<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer>讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer>所佔用。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[實作 Dispose 方法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 永遠呼叫`Dispose`釋放您的最後一個參考至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer>之前

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它所使用的資源將不會釋放直到記憶體回收行程呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer>物件的`Finalize`方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer>

trans-unit.source: Populates a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> with the data needed to serialize the target object.
trans-unit.target: 於其中填入<xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref>將序列化目標物件所需的資料。

trans-unit.source: For more information and a code example, see <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊和程式碼範例，請參閱<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that is the destination for this serialization.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>也就是這個序列化的目的端。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> cannot be populated with data because no data exists, or it is not in the correct format.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref>沒有資料存在，或者它不是處於正確的格式，因此無法擴展的資料。
